explanation: [0-0] A pair of gloved hands holds a red decorative panel with insulation, preparing to install it on a brick wall.

[0-4] The hands continue to fix the decorative panel onto the brick wall, maintaining the position. Then the shot cuts to a close-up, showing a part of the brick wall and the panel. A gloved hand inserts a yellow plastic expansion tube into a hole in the brick wall, and then hammers it in with a black hammer. Subsequently, a metal bracket appears in the frame, and a hand aligns it with the yellow expansion tube on the wall.
